1.name: Toy Story 2
1.description: When Woody is stolen by a toy collector, Buzz and his friends set out on a rescue mission to save Woody before he becomes a museum toy property with his roundup gang Jessie, Prospector, and Bullseye.

2.name: The Matrix
2.description: A computer hacker learns from mysterious rebels about the true nature of his reality and his role in the war against its controllers.

3.name: Fight Club
3.description: An insomniac office worker and a devil-may-care soapmaker form an underground fight club that evolves into something much, much more.

4.name: American Beauty
4.description: A sexually frustrated suburban father has a mid-life crisis after becoming infatuated with his daughter's best friend.

5.name: Drop Dead Gorgeous
5.description: A small-town beauty pageant turns deadly as it becomes clear that someone will go to any lengths to win.

6.name: The Mummy
6.description: At an archaeological dig in the ancient city of Hamunaptra, an American serving in the French Foreign Legion accidentally awakens a mummy who begins to wreck havoc as he searches for the reincarnation of his long-lost love.

7.name: American Pie
7.description: Four teenage boys enter a pact to lose their virginity by prom night.

8.name: The Green Mile
8.description: The lives of guards on Death Row are affected by one of their charges: a black man accused of child murder and rape, yet who has a mysterious gift.

9.name: Star Wars: Episode I - The Phantom Menace
9.description: Two Jedi escape a hostile blockade to find allies and come across a young boy who may bring balance to the Force, but the long dormant Sith resurface to claim their old glory.

10.name: Eyes Wide Shut
10.description: A New York City doctor embarks on a harrowing, night-long odyssey of sexual and moral discovery after his wife reveals a painful secret to him.

11.name: Notting Hill
11.description: The life of a simple bookshop owner changes when he meets the most famous film star in the world.

12.name: 10 Things I Hate About You
12.description: A pretty, popular teenager can't go out on a date until her ill-tempered older sister does.

13.name: The Sixth Sense
13.description: A boy who communicates with spirits seeks the help of a disheartened child psychologist.

14.name: Wild Wild West
14.description: The two best special agents in the Wild West must save President Grant from the clutches of a diabolical, wheelchair-bound, steampunk-savvy, Confederate scientist bent on revenge for losing the Civil War.

15.name: Double Jeopardy
15.description: A woman framed for her husband's murder suspects he is still alive; as she has already been tried for the crime, she can't be re-prosecuted if she finds and kills him.

16.name: Deep Blue Sea
16.description: Searching for a cure to Alzheimer's disease, a group of scientists on an isolated research facility become the prey, as a trio of intelligent sharks fight back.

17.name: The Virgin Suicides
17.description: A group of male friends become obsessed with five mysterious sisters who are sheltered by their strict, religious parents in suburban Detroit in the mid 1970s.

18.name: Office Space
18.description: Three company workers who hate their jobs decide to rebel against their greedy boss.

19.name: Girl, Interrupted
19.description: Based on writer Susanna Kaysen's account of her 18-month stay at a mental hospital in the late 1960s.

20.name: The Talented Mr. Ripley
20.description: In late 1950s New York, Tom Ripley, a young underachiever, is sent to Italy to retrieve Dickie Greenleaf, a rich and spoiled millionaire playboy. But when the errand fails, Ripley takes extreme measures.

21.name: Sleepy Hollow
21.description: Ichabod Crane is sent to Sleepy Hollow to investigate the decapitations of three people, with the culprit being the legendary apparition, The Headless Horseman.

22.name: Cruel Intentions
22.description: Two vicious step-siblings of an elite Manhattan prep school make a wager: to deflower the new headmaster's daughter before the start of term.

23.name: Magnolia
23.description: An epic mosaic of interrelated characters in search of love, forgiveness, and meaning in the San Fernando Valley.

24.name: Dick
24.description: Two girls wander away from a White House tour and meet President Nixon.

25.name: Austin Powers: The Spy Who Shagged Me
25.description: Dr. Evil is back and has invented a new time machine that allows him to go back to the 1960s and steal Austin Powers' mojo, inadvertently leaving him "shagless".

26.name: Big Daddy
26.description: A lazy law school grad adopts a kid to impress his girlfriend, but everything doesn't go as planned and he becomes the unlikely foster father.

27.name: October Sky
27.description: The true story of Homer Hickam, a coal miner's son who was inspired by the first Sputnik launch to take up rocketry against his father's wishes.

28.name: Tarzan
28.description: A man raised by gorillas must decide where he really belongs when he discovers he is a human.

29.name: Galaxy Quest
29.description: The alumni cast of a space opera television series have to play their roles as the real thing when an alien race needs their help. However, they also have to defend both Earth and the alien race from a reptilian warlord.

30.name: She's All That
30.description: A high school jock makes a bet that he can turn an unattractive girl into the school's prom queen.

31.name: Varsity Blues
31.description: A back-up quarterback is chosen to lead a Texas football team to victory after the star quarterback is injured.

32.name: The Blair Witch Project
32.description: Three film students vanish after traveling into a Maryland forest to film a documentary on the local Blair Witch legend, leaving only their footage behind.

33.name: Dogma
33.description: An abortion clinic worker with a special heritage is called upon to save the existence of humanity from being negated by two renegade angels trying to exploit a loop-hole and reenter Heaven.

34.name: Boys Don't Cry
34.description: A young man named Brandon Teena navigates love, life, and being transgender in rural Nebraska.

35.name: The World Is Not Enough
35.description: James Bond uncovers a nuclear plot when he protects an oil heiress from her former kidnapper, an international terrorist who can't feel pain.

36.name: Being John Malkovich
36.description: A puppeteer discovers a portal that leads literally into the head of movie star John Malkovich.

37.name: The Boondock Saints
37.description: Two Irish Catholic brothers become vigilantes and wipe out Boston's criminal underworld in the name of God.

38.name: The Love Letter
38.description: The power of words and images to open hearts. Helen runs, miles a day, to burn off energy: she's an emotional celibate. Going through the post at her shop, she finds a romantic and poetic ...                See full summary »

39.name: Never Been Kissed
39.description: A newspaper reporter enrolls in high school as part of research for a story.

40.name: Stuart Little
40.description: The Little family adopt a charming young mouse named Stuart, but the family cat wants rid of him.

41.name: The 13th Warrior
41.description: A man, having fallen in love with the wrong woman, is sent by the sultan himself on a diplomatic mission to a distant land as an ambassador. Stopping at a Viking village port to restock on supplies, he finds himself unwittingly embroiled in a quest to banish a mysterious threat in a distant Viking land.

42.name: The Haunting
42.description: When Eleanor, Theo, and Luke decide to take part in a sleep study at a huge mansion they get more than they bargained for when Dr. Marrow tells them of the house's ghostly past.

43.name: South Park: Bigger, Longer & Uncut
43.description: When Cartman and his friends go see an R rated movie, they start cursing and their parents think that Canada is to blame.

44.name: The Insider
44.description: A research chemist comes under personal and professional attack when he decides to appear in a "60 Minutes" expose on Big Tobacco.

45.name: The Ninth Gate
45.description: A rare book dealer, while seeking out the last two copies of a demon text, gets drawn into a conspiracy with supernatural overtones.

46.name: Lake Placid
46.description: Three people attempt to stop a gigantic crocodile, who is terrorizing residents in Black Lake, Maine.

47.name: The Thomas Crown Affair
47.description: A very rich and successful playboy amuses himself by stealing artwork, but may have met his match in a seductive detective.

48.name: Go
48.description: Go! tells the story of the events after a drug deal, told from three different points of view.

49.name: The Bone Collector
49.description: A quadriplegic ex-homicide detective and his female partner try to track down a serial killer who is terrorizing New York City.

50.name: End of Days
50.description: At the end of the century, Satan visits New York in search of a bride. It's up to an ex-cop who now runs an elite security outfit to stop him.
